title: I am from India. I brought pixel 2 pone when it released.all the features won't work in India.
content: I am from India. I brought pixel 2 pone when it released.all the features won't work in India. But cost wise samein India and USA. But feature like volte wifi calling not support in India. Even many time i ask googe support, they are helpless. Many times i feel to change the phone. Even small budget phones have many more features then pixel. I am suggesting my friends not to buy pixel phones. You also suggest your friends not to buy pixel phones.
